## Vault.delete() method

Deletes the file completely.

**Signature:**

```typescript
delete(file: TAbstractFile, force?: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>file</code> | [`TAbstractFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TAbstractFile.md) | The file or folder to be deleted |
|  <code>force</code> | <code>boolean</code> | _(Optional)_ Should attempt to delete folder even if it has hidden children |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<void>`
